SEARCH
Package network.structure

Class NetworkView

java.lang.Object
network.structure.NetworkView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class NetworkView extends Object implements View
This class hides the network to the controller.

    • showTurn

      public void showTurn(String player, Board gameBoard, Library playerLibrary, ArrayList<ObjectCard> playerObjInHand, int[] completedCommonObjectives, int[] availableCommonObjectivePoints, String firstPlayerToEnd, String playerNickname)
      Description copied from interface: View
      This method will show the current turn of the game, whether it's for the player in turn or not. It will be up to the client to check if it's for him.
      Specified by:
      showTurn in interface View
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      gameBoard - is the board of the game.
      playerLibrary - is the player's library.
      playerObjInHand - are the objects the player currently has in hand.
      completedCommonObjectives - is the array of points for each completed common objective.
      availableCommonObjectivePoints - is the array of available points for each common objective.
      firstPlayerToEnd - is the nickname of the first player that has finished the game.
      playerNickname - is the nickname of the player. Needed for the GUI.

      Description copied from interface: View

      Specified by:
      showWinner in interface View
      Parameters:
      winner - is the username of the winner.
      leaderboard - is a HashMap containing the pairs (username, points).
